channel.title: Can't add this command ANYWHERE?

item.title: Can't add this command ANYWHERE?
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

[quote=“dragon39990, post:2, topic:344491”]You ended it without starting it. if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && playerRights >= 0) { sendQuest("@gre@Project Revert - Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("::runes Gives you runes. Can only use once!", 8147); sendQuest("::arrows Gives you arrows. Can only use once!", 8148); sendQuest("::food Gives you food. Can only use once!", 8149); sendQuest("::changepassword NEWPASSWORD - changes your password", 8150); sendQuest("::players - view everyone online", 8151); sendQuest("::donationinfo - view the benefits of donating!", 8152); sendQuest("::credits - view the credits due by this server", 8153); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
try that, i think thats where it should start.[/quote]

Btw if you couldn’t see the difference I believe you would need the space after the ). You may not but I don’t really know anymore its been awhile since I visited this site hah.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't add this command ANYWHERE?
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

You ended it without starting it. if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && playerRights >= 0){ sendQuest("@gre@Project Revert - Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("::runes Gives you runes. Can only use once!", 8147); sendQuest("::arrows Gives you arrows. Can only use once!", 8148); sendQuest("::food Gives you food. Can only use once!", 8149); sendQuest("::changepassword NEWPASSWORD - changes your password", 8150); sendQuest("::players - view everyone online", 8151); sendQuest("::donationinfo - view the benefits of donating!", 8152); sendQuest("::credits - view the credits due by this server", 8153); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
try that, i think thats where it should start.

item.title: Can't add this command ANYWHERE?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Anywhere I add this, I get the 100 errors of death…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && playerRights >= 0) sendQuest("@gre@Project Revert - Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("::runes Gives you runes. Can only use once!", 8147); sendQuest("::arrows Gives you arrows. Can only use once!", 8148); sendQuest("::food Gives you food. Can only use once!", 8149); sendQuest("::changepassword NEWPASSWORD - changes your password", 8150); sendQuest("::players - view everyone online", 8151); sendQuest("::donationinfo - view the benefits of donating!", 8152); sendQuest("::credits - view the credits due by this server", 8153); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
